text: Forget about Batman & the Batmobile. Real-life hero #pharmacist Lance Moran & his #Vaccine Mobile are making sure that patients who can’t leave home are protected against influenza. He says he’s ready to also provide the #COVID19 vaccine. 🦸👏👏👏#PharmacistsOnTheFrontline https://t.co/OkMsXNHRdQ
